item.title: Jenna add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Forgiveness is an act of the will, and the will can function regardless of the temperature of the heart." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Beth Nimmo
item.description: "What if you were to die today... Tomorrow is not a promise but a chance." -- Beth Nimmo

item.title: Jenna add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "We read to know we're not alone." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Jenna add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Give me all of you!!! I don’t want so much of your time, so much of your talents and money, and so much of your work. I want YOU!!! ALL OF YOU!! I have not come to torment or frustrate the natural man or woman, but to KILL IT! No half measures will do. I don’t want to only prune a branch here and a branch there; rather I want the whole tree out! Hand it over to me, the whole outfit, all of your desires, all of your wants and wishes and dreams. Turn them ALL over to me, give yourself to me and I will make of you a new self---in my image. Give me yourself and in exchange I will give you Myself. My will, shall become your will. My heart, shall become your heart." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "If we ever forget that we're one nation under God, then we will be one nation gone under." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Max Lucado
item.description: "A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her." -- Max Lucado

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Howard
item.description: "The geologic column is a bunch of balarky." -- Howard

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Jonathan Swift
item.description: "May you live every day of your life." -- Jonathan Swift

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Arthur Keith
item.description: "...the student of prehistoric man...cannot reject [the Castenedolo skull] as false without doing injury to his sense of truth, and he cannot accept it as fact without shattering his accepted beliefs." -- Arthur Keith

item.title: Jenna add a quote by E.J.H. Corner
item.description: "...but I still think that to the unprejudiced, the fossil record of plants is in favor of special creation." -- E.J.H. Corner

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth." -- Anonymous

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Therefore, my brothers, I want you to know that through Jesus the forgiveness of sins is proclaimed to you. Acts 13:38" -- Anonymous

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Brennan Manning
item.description: "My deepest awareness of myself is that I am deeply loved by Jesus Christ and I have done nothing to earn it or deserve it." -- Brennan Manning

item.title: Jenna add a quote by John Piper
item.description: "Not to abide in Jesus’ love would mean that we stop believing that we are loved by Jesus. We look at our circumstances - perhaps persecution or disease or abandonment - and we conclude that we are not loved by Jesus anymore. That’s the opposite of abiding in the love of Jesus. So abiding in his love means continuing to believe, moment by moment, that we are loved." -- John Piper

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? Shall trouble or hardship or persecution or famine or nakedness or danger or sword? 36 As it is written: "For your sake we face death all day long; we are considered as sheep to be slaughtered." 37 No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us. 38 For I am convinced that neither death nor life, neither angels nor demons, neither the present nor the future, nor any powers, 39 neither height nor depth, nor anything else in all creation, will be able to separate us from the love of God that is in Christ Jesus our Lord." -- Anonymous

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Abigail Van Buren
item.description: "The best index to a person's character is how he treats people who can't do him any good, and how he treats people who can't fight back." -- Abigail Van Buren

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Don't think or judge, just listen." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Jenna add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Billy Sunday
item.description: "Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile." -- Billy Sunday

item.title: Jenna add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "It's the job that's never started as takes longest to finish." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Jenna add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Rick Warren
item.description: "You were made by God and for God and until you understand that, life will never make sense." -- Rick Warren

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Anonymous
item.description:
"This day I call heaven and earth as witnesses against you that I have set before you life and death, blessings and curses. Now choose life, so that you and your children may live 20 and that you may love the LORD your God, listen to his voice, and hold fast to him. For the LORD is your life, and he will give you many years in the land he swore to give to your fathers, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob.
Deuteronomy 30:19-20 (NIV)" -- Anonymous

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Jenna add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I never exactly made a book. It's rather like taking dictation. I was given things to say. " -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jenna add a quote by Joshua Harris
item.description: "Living to glorify God means doing everything... for Him, His way, to point to His greatness and to reflect His goodness." -- Joshua Harris

item.title: Jenna add a quote by David Livingstone
item.description: "God, send me anywhere, only go with me. Lay any burden on me, only sustain me. And sever any tie in my heart except the tie that binds my heart to Yours." -- David Livingstone
